p: Take all the ingredients in dry form as per standards laid down in Ayurvedic Pharmacopoeia and make coarse powder. Make sachets or tea bags each of 3 g of powder or 500 mg tablet of aqueous extract, to be consumed like tea or hot drink by dissolving in 150 ml of boiled water, once or twice daily. Gud (Jaggery)/ Draksha (Resins) and/or Lemon Juice can be added while consuming the formulation.
